room_title: Escape room "Conspiracy Cure" by Premier Escape Rooms in San Antonio
room_address: 19186 Blanco Rd Ste 102 San Antonio, TX 78258
room_description:
You've entered a secret lab with a team trying to find the cure which is rumored to exist for an epidemic currently wiping out the country. It's believed to have been created as a measure of population control and it has so far been very effective.
Upon entering the lab you discover an open test tube. OH NO!! Now you are all infected. The doors have locked as a containment measure and you have to find the cure to save yourselves and then find a way out before the containment procedures begin...
